definitions.text: machine that converts other forms of energy into mechanical energy and so imparts motion
a nonspecific agent that imparts motion
examples: happiness is the aim of all men and the motor of all action

definitions.text: travel or be transported in a vehicle
examples: We drove to the university every morning
They motored to London for the theater

definitions.text: conveying information to the muscles from the CNS
causing or able to cause motion
